description: Prose style profiles that guide narrative voice, pacing, and technique

prose_approach.description: The overall approach to prose style

commercial.name: Commercial/Accessible
commercial.description: Clear, readable prose optimized for mass-market appeal
commercial.sentence_style: Short to moderate length, varied rhythm, easy to follow
commercial.dialogue_approach: Frequent, drives pacing, clear tags or action beats
commercial.description_density: Concrete and sensory, efficient, doesn't slow pace
commercial.pov_approach: Close third or first person, emotionally accessible

literary.name: Literary
literary.description: Denser prose that rewards close reading, prioritizes voice and theme
literary.sentence_style: Varied, allows longer flowing sentences, rhythmic
literary.dialogue_approach: Meaningful exchanges, subtext, may be sparse
literary.pov_approach: Deep interiority, may use free indirect discourse

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.description: Spare, precise prose where every word earns its place
minimalist.pov_approach: Often detached or restrained, iceberg style

pulp.name: Pulp/Action
pulp.description: Fast, punchy prose that prioritizes momentum and excitement
pulp.description_density: Quick strokes, just enough to see the scene

lyrical.name: Lyrical/Atmospheric
lyrical.description: Poetic prose that prioritizes mood, beauty, and sensory immersion
lyrical.sentence_style: Flowing, musical, may use repetition and imagery
lyrical.dialogue_approach: Integrated with narrative, may be stylized
lyrical.pov_approach: Immersive, may blend thought and perception

conversational.name: Conversational/Voice-Driven
conversational.description: Strong narrative voice that feels like someone telling you a story
conversational.sentence_style: Natural speech rhythms, personality in syntax
conversational.dialogue_approach: Character voice paramount, distinct speech patterns
conversational.pov_approach: First person or close third with strong voice

dialogue_density.description: How much of the narrative is dialogue vs prose

high.name: High (40-60%)
high.description: Dialogue-driven storytelling, scenes play out in conversation

moderate.name: Moderate (25-40%)
moderate.description: Balanced mix of dialogue and narrative

low.name: Low (<25%)
low.description: Narrative-driven, dialogue used sparingly for impact

pacing_style.description: The overall rhythm and speed of the narrative

fast.name: Fast/Propulsive
fast.description: Quick scenes, frequent cuts, momentum prioritized

measured.name: Measured/Balanced
measured.description: Varies pace by scene needs, breathing room between intensity

slow_burn.name: Slow Burn
slow_burn.description: Patient development, atmosphere and character prioritized

custom_notes.description: Users may add custom style notes to override or supplement these selections
examples: Keep description grounded even in fantasy elements
